languages.text: {n}За бегущими цифрами тяжело следить, но вам удается вычленить несколько уравнений... схем... теорем. Все они бессмысленны, потому что в основании каждой лежит абсурдное нарушение законов исчисления.{/n}

{n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems. They are all senseless, for the simple reason that each one is based on an absurd violation of the laws of calculation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За бегущими цифрами тяжело следить, но вам удается вычленить несколько уравнений... схем... теорем. Все они бессмысленны, потому что в основании каждой лежит абсурдное нарушение законов исчисления.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems... They are all senseless for the simple reason that each one is based on absurd violation of calculation rules.{/n}

languages.text: {n}スクロールしていく数字を追うのは容易いことではなかったが、あなたはいくつか質問…図解…原理を見つけ出すことに、なんとか成功した。計算法則の不合理な違反行為に基づいているという単純な理由で、それらは全て意味のないものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems. They are all senseless, for the simple reason that each one is based on an absurd violation of the laws of calculation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スクロールしていく数字を追うのは容易いことではなかったが、あなたはいくつか質問…図解…原理を見つけ出すことに、なんとか成功した。計算法則の不合理な違反行為に基づいているという単純な理由で、それらは全て意味のないものだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你努力跟上屏幕上滚动的数字，这并不是件简单的事情。你注意到了一部分算式……图例……与定理，但这一切都毫无意义。原因很简单——所有的计算过程都非常荒谬，违背了所有计算规则。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems. They are all senseless, for the simple reason that each one is based on an absurd violation of the laws of calculation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你努力跟上屏幕上滚动的数字，这并不是件简单的事情。你注意到了一部分算式……图例……与定理，但这一切都毫无意义。原因很简单——所有的计算过程都非常荒谬，违背了所有计算规则。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist nicht einfach, mit den scrollenden Zahlen Schritt zu halten, aber du kannst einige Gleichungen erkennen ... Schemata ... Theoreme. Sie sind sinnlos – aus dem einfachen Grund, dass sie auf einer absurden Verletzung der Berechnungsgesetze basieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems. They are all senseless, for the simple reason that each one is based on an absurd violation of the laws of calculation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist nicht einfach, mit den scrollenden Zahlen Schritt zu halten, aber du kannst einige Gleichungen erkennen ... Schemata ... Theoreme. Sie sind sinnlos –aus dem einfachen Grund, weil sie auf einer absurden Verletzung der Berechnungsregeln basieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}S'il n'est guère facile de suivre les chiffres qui défilent à l'écran, vous parvenez tout de même à repérer quelques équations... entre autres formules et théorèmes mathématiques. Tous sans exception sont absurdes, car ils s'appuient sur une violation insensée des lois de calcul.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems. They are all senseless, for the simple reason that each one is based on an absurd violation of the laws of calculation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}S'il n'est guère facile de suivre les chiffres qui défilent à l'écran, vous parvenez tout de même à repérer quelques équations... entre autres formules et théorèmes mathématiques. Tous sans exception sont absurdes, car ils s'appuient sur une violation insensée des règles de calcul.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No es fácil seguir las cifras que se desplazan rápidamente por la tablilla de datos, pero logras distinguir algunas ecuaciones... esquemas... teoremas. Todos son absurdos, por la sencilla razón de que están basados en una flagrante violación de las leyes del cálculo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems. They are all senseless, for the simple reason that each one is based on an absurd violation of the laws of calculation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No es fácil seguir las cifras que se desplazan rápidamente por la tablilla de datos, pero logras distinguir algunas ecuaciones... esquemas... teoremas. Todos son absurdos por la sencilla razón de que están basados en una flagrante violación de las leyes del cálculo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kayan sayıları takip etmesi hiç kolay değil ancak birkaç denklem, şema ve teorem yakalamayı başarıyorsun. Mantık dışılar. Öyle olmalarının sebebi de basit: Temel hesaplama kanunlarını absürt bir şekilde ihlal ediyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is no easy task to keep up with the scrolling numbers, but you manage to pick out a few equations... schemes... theorems. They are all senseless, for the simple reason that each one is based on an absurd violation of the laws of calculation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kayan sayıları takip etmesi hiç kolay değil ancak birkaç denklem, şema, teorem yakalamayı başarıyorsun. Mantık dışılar. Öyle olmalarının sebebi de basit: Hesaplamaların temel kanunlarını absürt şekilde ihlal ediyorlar.{/n}
